description: a(n) = d(sigma(n)), where d(k) is the number of divisors function (A000005) and sigma(k) is the sum of divisor function (A000203).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,120,print(numdiv(sigma(n))))(PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b062068.txt", n, " ", numdiv(sigma(n))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 31 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 13 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 16 2001
